desc: Firebrand is a bold, eye-catching, innovative collection of fireplace tools and fire pits. Led by Ed Cruikshank, an award-winning bespoke furniture designer, Firebrand products are a unique combination of industrial design expertise, Kiwi ingenuity and manufacturing know-how. Designed in New Zealand and forged in fire.

layout.text: CREATING CONNECTIONS THAT INSPIRE MEANINGFUL CONVERSATIONS
